alert.note: Alert for Allen; Beauregard; Evangeline; Northern Acadia; Northern Calcasieu; Northern Jefferson Davis; Rapides; Vernon (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 26 at 11:44PM CST by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT SOUTHERN RAPIDES...NORTHERN JEFFERSON DAVIS...EVANGELINE...EASTERN BEAUREGARD...NORTHWESTERN ACADIA...NORTHEASTERN CALCASIEU...SOUTHEASTERN VERNON AND ALLEN PARISHES THROUGH 1215 AM CST... At 1144 PM CST, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Elizabeth to near Lebleu Settlement. Movement was northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to vegetation and outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Lake Charles, Oakdale, Mamou, Iowa, Kinder, Basile, Oberlin, Glenmora, Elton, Cheneyville, Elizabeth, Turkey Creek, Fenton, Reeves, Dry Creek, Sugartown, Pitkin, Mittie, Moss Bluff, and Grant. This includes the following highways... Interstate 10 in Louisiana between mile markers 33 and 40, and between mile markers 43 and 44. Interstate 49 between mile markers 55 and 68. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Allen; Beauregard; Evangeline; Northern Acadia; Northern Calcasieu; Northern Jefferson Davis; Rapides; Vernon
